name: ARQuickLookPreviewItem
desc: An object for customizing the AR Quick Look experience.

items.name: init(fileAt: URL)
items.desc: Initializes a new AR Quick Look preview item.

items.name: var allowsContentScaling: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the user can scale your virtual content using pinch gestures.

items.name: var canonicalWebPageURL: URL?
items.desc: The web URL to share when the user invokes the share sheet.
